alert.note: Alert for Caroline (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 01 at 8:06PM EDT until April 01 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL SUSSEX...SOUTHERN KENT AND NORTHEASTERN CAROLINE COUNTIES... At 805 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Fortesque to near Bowers to near Denton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Dover, Milford, Harrington, Camden, Bowers, Woodside, Viola, Rising Sun-Lebanon, Rising Sun, Dover Base Housing, Big Stone Beach, Wyoming, Felton, Frederica, Houston, Magnolia, Little Creek, Rodney Village, Kent Acres and Riverview. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM EDT for central and southern Delaware...eastern Maryland...and southern New Jersey. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
